ygData.subject: Re: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, a nicely decked out level 22 could solo there.   The skeletons (level 12 - 14?) and the gargoyles (level 18 - 20?) share the same spawn, but the spawn
ygData.messageBody:
>
>From: "Jeff Bleich" <dolph@...>
>
>
>
>Thank god you mentioned gargoyles. I'm level 22nd monk from cazic thule
>and
>was wondering where I should hunt. I've hunted gorge hounds for the last 3
>levels and I do not want to hunt avaiks due to the over crowded population.
>I'm fully decked out with serpentines/exe hoods/black pearl so i'm rather
>strong for my level. I guess what I'm asking is that What level are
>gargoyles and what island are they on? and do they respawn fast? any
>trains?
>Can I solo?

Yes, a nicely decked out level 22 could solo there. The skeletons (level
12 - 14?) and the gargoyles (level 18 - 20?) share the same spawn, but the
spawn is pretty fast.

>
>Does anyone recomend Cazic thule? I friend of mine said it took her 2 hours
>to find a group(24thmage) and died/zoned many of times.

I have seen warriors solo there, but mostly you need a good group.
Especially someone who can root or snare. Level 20 - 35 can hunt that zone
assuming it's not packed (and it often is).

>
>Another question. I have no boots. Leather is too heavy. They don't make
>mesh. Anyone know where i can get good boots with low wieght?
>

I use cloth shoes, but I hear wolf fur slippers from Permafrost are good
monk shoes.

>Thanks for your time,
>
>Bismatal Bumrusher 22nd Circle
>

Dornn

>
